trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
There were no other sightings in Shreveport on or around September 18th 1981
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding in front of house near street talking to friends, I had this feeling that someone was watching me or that feeling you get that makes you turn to see,thats when I noticed the bright Blue Mass of Light in the sky, I screamed out LOOK AT THAT!!! We all saw it !!! We started walking to the neighborhood store,talking about what we had seen the whole time,as we were entering thr front of the store some other people overheard us talking and said they saw the same thing!!! It moved sooooooo fast,when I pointed at it,it almost seemed surprised!!! then jetted off and disappeared!!
Summary: At approx. 2:00 pm, standing infront othe house talking to friends, feeling like someone was watching me, I turned and saw a bright blue mass of light, that moved extremely fast when I turned around and pointed at it!!!
